name: Fulgoryx
printed_effect:
Elestrals that are not {lunar}/{solar}-Enchanted get -5 {attack}.
You can Nexus {lunar}/{wind}.
When this Fulgoryx receives 1 or more {lunar}/{wind}
in a Nexus you can target an opponent's card
and put it on the bottom of their deck.
